dashboard.subheading: Automating workflows for feasibility projections and optimal procurement.

extractBom.title: Extract BOM from Drawing
extractBom.description: Extract BOMs from customer specifications to serve as the basis for feasibility projections.
extractBom.prompt: Extract a complete BOM from: [drawing/specification or filename/path]. Return a structured list with position, item number, description, quantity, and unit.

searchParts.title: Search Parts & Inventory
searchParts.description: Interface with Octopart to find optimal sourcing options and check against Xentral ERP inventory.
searchParts.prompt: Find availability and procurement options for: [part numbers / manufacturer / quantities]. Include best price, MOQ, lead time, and supplier.

login.termsPrefix: By continuing, you agree to our

legal.termsContent:
# 1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using the KakoAI platform, services, and API (collectively, the "Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use the Service.

# 2. Service Description

KakoAI provides AI-powered feasibility projections, Bill of Materials (BOM) extraction, and procurement optimization tools. While we strive for high accuracy, the output generated by our Artificial Intelligence models is probabilistic and may contain errors. Users should verify all critical data, especially regarding part numbers and pricing, before making procurement decisions.

# 3. User Obligations

You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes. You represent that any data, including engineering drawings or specifications, uploaded to the platform is your property or you have the necessary rights to process it. You must not look for vulnerabilities, reverse engineer the API, or use the Service to develop a competing product.

# 4. Intellectual Property

All rights, title, and interest in and to the Service (excluding content provided by users) are and will remain the exclusive property of Kako Elektro GmbH. Your use of the Service does not grant you any right to use our trademarks, logos, or domain names.

# 5. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Kako Elektro GmbH shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of the Service.

# 6. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes by posting an announcement on the Service. Your continued use of the Service after any such change constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms of Service.
legal.privacyContent:
# 1. Introduction

Kako Elektro GmbH ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website or use our KakoAI platform.

# 2. Data We Collect

**Identity Data:** Includes first name, last name, and username.
**Contact Data:** Includes email address and billing address.
**Technical Data:** Includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version.
**Usage Data:** Includes information about how you use our website, uploaded BOM files, and chat queries.

# 3. How We Use Your Data

We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we use your personal data to:
- Register you as a new customer.
- Process and deliver your BOM extractions and feasibility reports.
- Manage our relationship with you.
- Improve our website, products/services, marketing, and customer relationships.

# 4. Data Storage and Security

We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. We limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors, and other third parties who have a business need to know.

# 5. Third-Party Services

We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Cloud, Octopart) solely for the purpose of providing the AI functionality and search results required by the Service. We ensure all third parties respect the security of your personal data and treat it in accordance with the law.

# 6. Your Legal Rights

Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to request access, correction, erasure, restriction, transfer, or to object to processing.
